name: Shopify
description: Integrate with Shopify to list, create, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Products
tools.description: List products in the Shopify store. Returns product titles, statuses, vendors, and variant counts.

tools.name: Create Product
tools.description: Create a new product in the Shopify store. Provide a title and optional body HTML, vendor, product type, and tags.

tools.name: List Orders
tools.description: List orders from the Shopify store. Optionally filter by status, fulfillment status, or financial status.

tools.name: Get Order
tools.description: Get details of a single Shopify order by its ID. Returns full order information including line items.

tools.name: List Customers
tools.description: List customers in the Shopify store. Optionally search by query string.

store.label: Store Name
store.description: Your Shopify store name (e.g. "mystore" for mystore.myshopify.com)
